name: Charming Alice
description:
Help Alice and the Cheshire Cat on their adventure through Wonderland. Follow the white rabbit through amazing lands visiting wondrous places and meeting amusing characters! Match and swap well known pieces from all over Wonderland to master this fun and challenging puzzle. See this remarkable story come to life like never before!

- Amazing graphic!
- Free and filled with adventure!
- Easy and really hard level!
- For the whole family!
- Play this game and get ready to be transported to a new world!
